body.content:
My name is Evan Raffeal Waiz, original from Germany but based in Ireland. I work as a Geologist with our company's new power and energy company in Ireland. I am 61 years old and single now, born month of September. I lost my wife early last year to health problem, she was 57 years when she died.
 I am seeking a relationship which i want to start with friendship. I want a matured minded friend/partner to build a happy family together. I want you to know that age, color, distance, race, or religion is not problem to me, as long as we both are matured in mind and understands each other.
 I love traveling, outdoors, sports, nature, meaningful music, and i am happy and jovial person to be around with. It will be my pleasure to really find a good woman as you, for us to build a lovely relationship and family.
 I hope to get your reply as an indication of your interest in my friendship proposal.
 Attached are some of my pictures, and i hope to get your photos also, with introduction of yourself.
 
Regards.
Raffeal Waiz
